title: S13 Ep66: Supernatural News 160/Anatomy of a Poltergeist
itunes:title: Supernatural News 160/Anatomy of a Poltergeist
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS reports on the Supernatural News of the week and pays tribute to a few of our fallen friends in the Paranormal, radio pioneer Art Bell & Paranormal Researcher Guy Lyon Playfair

In the second part of todays show we revisit an episode of Darkness Radio to discuss The Anatomy of a Poltergeist with the author of the definitive book on The Enfield Poltergeist Case, Guy Lyon Playfair.

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
